## About me

Welcome to my portfolio! 🚀 I’m Partha Sai Guttikonda, a driven and innovative Full-Stack Engineer and Researcher with expertise in machine learning, high-performance computing, and software development. 🧠💻 With a Master’s degree in Computer Science from the University of Texas at Arlington and hands-on experience in building and optimizing scalable web applications, managing microservice architectures, and implementing advanced AI techniques, I’ve worked on projects that enhance diagnostic tools, improve infrastructure efficiency, and optimize data-driven workflows. 🌟 Explore my work to discover how I’ve contributed to the fields of medical imaging, cloud computing, and backend systems. 🏥☁️ I’m always looking for opportunities to collaborate and create impactful, cutting-edge solutions! 🌐✨
